comment: I almost like this vaccine.We are supposed to behave as if we have a contagious case of covid and everyone else is "healthy"Get this vaccine and we can all behave as if we have HIV and everyone around us does not.

# ::snt I almost like this vaccine.We are supposed to behave as if we have a contagious case of covid and everyone else is "healthy"Get this vaccine and we can all behave as if we have HIV and everyone around us does not.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / like-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                  :mod (t / this))
            :mod (a / almost))
      :snt2 (s / suppose-02

            :ARG2 (b / behave-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (h / have-03
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (c / case-04
                                    :ARG1 (d / disease
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "vitamin"
                                                :op2 "Covid"))
                                    :mod (c2 / contagious)))
                        :op2 (h2 / healthy
                              :domain (e / everyone
                                    :mod (e2 / else))))))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (g / get-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (v2 / vaccine
                        :mod (t2 / this)))
            :op2 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (b2 / behave-01
                        :ARG0 (w2 / we
                              :mod (a4 / all))
                        :ARG1 (h3 / have-03
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 (e3 / everyone
                                    :location (a5 / around
                                          :op1 w2))
                              :ARG1 d
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "HIV"))))))
